resources.string: QTR helps improve next generation device security, battery life and performance. QTR uses cellular or WiFi to automatically send anonymous device info and statistics data to QTI. Learn More
QTR helps improve next generation device security, battery life and performance. QTR uses cellular or WiFi to automatically send anonymous device info and statistics data to QTI.
Data collected by Qualcomm Technologies, Inc. in the U.S. and shared with its affiliates.

NOTICE & ACKNOWLEDGEMENT

QTR Non-Commercial

Qualcomm Technologies, Inc. (“QTI”) is continuously looking for ways to improve its products, and one such way is through gathering and evaluating certain performance and telemetry data relating to its products, such as the QTI Mobile Test Platform (“MTP Device”). To assist in the gathering of this data, as well as to help QTI in monitoring a company’s compliance with the terms of use for QTI products such as the MTP Device, QTI has developed a proprietary software referred to as QTR Non-Commercial.

QTR Non-Commercial is designed to obtain certain performance and telemetry data from MTP Devices, including, without limitation:

• Modem diagnostic logs;

• Application processor performance metrics (power used, CPU, GPU, thermal);

• App stats (data sent and received, connection duration, air interface technology used);

• Device information such as IMEI, chipset serial number, make, model, version, processor type, memory, operating system, display type and resolution;

• Wi-Fi and cellular network (3G/4G/5G) connectivity stats (data sent and received, along with connection duration);

• Sensor data relating, but not limited, to accelerometer, gravity, gyroscope, linear acceleration, rotation vector, game rotation vector, geomagnetic rotation vector, magnetic field, proximity, ambient temperature, light, pressure and relative humidity;

• Battery events;

• Location;

• IP address; and

• QTR Non-Commercial software ID.

Given QTR Non-Commercial has been designed to obtain the aforementioned data from MTP Devices, QTR Non-Commercial may only be installed on MTP devices, and thus said software shall NOT be installed or otherwise used on any commercially-released devices.

To that end, QTR Non-Commercial may be part of the software (“MTP Software”) that you will be receiving from QTI for use on an MTP Device that QTI is delivering under its limited use tools agreement (or such other agreement that, in lieu of the limited use tools agreement, covers the hardware and software development tools of QTI) with the legal entity that you represent (hereinafter collectively referred to as the “Tools Agreement”). Your use of the MTP Device and the associated MTP Software are subject to the terms and conditions of the Tools Agreement. As such, you may use the MTP Device and the MTP Software solely in connection with (A) the internal testing, evaluation and development of (i) devices that incorporate one (1) or more integrated circuits made by or on behalf of QTI, or (ii) software applications (including software drivers) that are supported on devices that incorporate one (1) or more integrated circuits made by or on behalf of QTI, or (B) deployment of wireless networks that support devices that incorporate one (1) or more integrated circuits made by or on behalf of QTI,.

By downloading and/or using the MTP Software, you hereby acknowledge that (A) you have read and understand this notice provision and agree to be bound by the terms of this notice provision, as well as the Tools Agreement, and (B) you are an authorized representative of the legal entity you represent.

For any further questions, please send an email to QTRNonCommercial.support@qti.qualcomm.com

Configuração e recolha de dados de desempenho ativada. Clique para saber mais ou desativar.

Relatórios de Tecnologia da Qualcomm

A recolha de dados de tipo de hardware e software, configuração e desempenho ajuda a Qualcomm Technologies, Inc. a melhorar a vida útil, segurança e desempenho da bateria do dispositivo da próxima geração. Desmarque a caixa de seleção para desativar. Saiba mais
